body.name: BBTO 20 Pieces Mirror Sheets Self Adhesive Non Glass Cut to Size Mirror Stickers Tiles for Wall Flexible Sticky Mirror()
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 37 mins
features: Covered with protective film: these mirrors are covered with a protective film, can protect the mirror surface from damaging or scratching during transportation, you should peel off the films before using; It is recommended to use it within 50 meters, so the image is clearer

Wide range of usage: these self adhesive mirrors work well with cars, motorcycles, bathroom mirrors, dresser mirrors and other household furniture, walls, toys or can also be applied with crafts, easy to stick and peel them; You can tear off the protective film on the front and back of the mirror before use, and the scratch will disappear
Mirror sheet measurement: this set of mirrors size comes with various sizes for you to choose, and 1 mm/ 0.04 in thickness, 20 pieces of mirror sheets, common and general for daily using
Quality and durable: this kind of non glass mirror is made of PET material, with smooth surface and good texture, self-adhesive back is convenient for you to use

Note: the mirror is PET material, different from normal mirror, the reflection effect is effective at a certain distance, getting closer will get a better effect; In order to stick it firmly, please stick it on the smooth and flat wall; In order to keep your wall intact, please stick it once, if you remove the mirror, it may damage the wall
body.description: Wide Applicable Surfaces The mirrors can be applied on many surfaces, work with cars, bathroom, dresser, toys or crafts, and other household furniture. Warm Notice Please keep the wall dry, clean and smooth before stick; Not to use scissors that may make irregular edges; Not suitable for children under 3 years old. Glass surface Wooden wall Smooth wall Painted wall

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Front & Back Protective Design PET Material & Suitable Size Enough Quantities to Use

Cut Any Shape You Want Use the mirror sheets simply cut it with a pen knife or professional tool to the shape that you want. The mirror works well in a variety of situations. Just remove the clear sheet protective film and ready to use. PET material provides smooth surface and good texture. It’s suitable for a range of applications and self-adhesive back is convenient for you to use. Wide Applicable Surfaces The mirrors can be applied on many surfaces, work with cars, bathroom, dresser, toys or crafts, and other household furniture. Warm Notice Please keep the wall dry, clean and smooth before stick; Not to use scissors that may make irregular edges; Not suitable for children under 3 years old. Glass surface Wooden wall Smooth wall Painted wall

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY THESE TILE MIRRORS
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I only rate 5 stars so the review actually shows up. The film is difficult to remove from front of these tiles causing half of them to crack in my experience. When I was able to get some of them hung, I got finger prints on the mirror and I thought that it was totally normal. When I attempted to clean with a microfiber cloth, it scratched the mirrors. I then sprayed some windex on them which did absolutely nothing to the scratches. I now have an area with 9 mirror tiles hung and it now looks like a distorted mirror found at a circus. Totally trash and I now cannot return them. DO NOT BUY!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2021
reviews.reviewText: After I install the mirror on my wall, I notice this mirror can not give you a even reflection, everything is disfigured in this mirror, since I already installed it and can not get it off my wall easily, I can not even return it, a warning for people want to purchase this item, it can not be used as a mirror, it can make your wall looks shiny at most!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Adhesive are good but not for a wall
reviews.reviewText: It look nice but seller instead of self-adhesion should ad double face dot is more effective than the self adhesion that have. They fall and broke and get stick together glue are good but not enough for the wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not mirror perfect but works well
reviews.reviewText: My apartment has these dirty mirror doors covered with glass so there was no way to clean it. I wanted a simple temporary solution. These were very easy to apply and look clear up close. Yes, from father away it gets a little distorted but you can hardly tell. I think applying it to a smooth surface yields better results. Been up for almost 3 months and still look great. Worth the money for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for project!
reviews.reviewText: I like the product , I used it for the kitchen area(Sink) it looks nice, I will buy it again.But the package was broken I didn’t like that they could change the wrap beforesend it that’s why I give it 4 stars ,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t waste your money
reviews.reviewText: It’s like circus mirrors all distorted and you have to be extremely close to the mirrors to get a straight reflection, I’d give it zero stars if I could

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars too expensive and doesnt adhear very well
reviews.reviewText: I received my package late. the package was intact, some of the mirror pieces were scratched. the quality of the reflection was not that great. put them up they seemed to be holding good, after about a day they started falling off the wall in which the corners got chipped bc I have wood floors. I would say they are definitely not worth the 22 dollars I paid for them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than I thought
reviews.reviewText: These are perfectly good little mirrors. In my mind they should be a bit bigger, but I must not be that good with measurements. The plastic cover that protects the mirror is hard to remove as is the glue part.
